feed.title: Mimblewimble: non-interactive coinjoin, signature aggregation and confidential transactions

entry.title: Mimblewimble: non-interactive coinjoin, signature aggregation and confidential transactions
entry.summary: Recently, a document was found on wizards with links to two different websites, one of which is authored by Bryan. The content of the document discusses Mimblewimble, non-interactive coinjoin, and better Bitcoin privacy. These topics were analyzed and commented upon in online forums such as Bitcoin Wizards and Reddit. Bryan's website also provides more information on these subjects.
